= L_Argument - Function arguments =
{{{
case class L_Argument(ty : L_Type, value : L_Value = null, attrs : List[String] = List(), argName : String = "") extends L_Node
}}}
An argument maps a [L_Value value] to a list of parameter attributes. It also provides the ability to optionally set the name of a function parameter by using the argName optional parameter when constructing the argument.
